name: Verify the status of the renewal term is Issued until the system date is greater than or equal to the expiry date of the prior term

testSteps.description: Given underwriter has ability to create policy
And with policy effective date is system date minus 364
And with policy expiry date is system date plus 1
And underwriter creates and books policy
When underwriter performs renewal transaction on policy with Effective Date as system date plus 1

userStory.storyName: Renewal term should be displayed as Issued status until prior term expiresﾠ(PI-2314)
